name: Opposite Worlds
description:
This game was made for the Trijam #102 with the theme Contrast

The goal of this game jam is to make a game in 3 hours ! It was my first time trying this challenge and it took me arround 3h30min. The additionnal time was mainly due to the level creation and the audio.

The levels shouldn't be too difficult, I wanted to test an idea of gameplay.

It was made using :

  • Godot Engine for development
  • Krita for graphics
  • sfxr and Boscaceoil for audio

Developed by Yagneel
